name: Cloud 9
description:
If you like the game, please consider donating!

A hard 5 minute Cloud jumping, bird hopping adventure which will put your reactions to the limit as you go through nine stages of increasing difficulty to reach Cloud 9.

Some of its features are:

- Fast gameplay and attractive graphics. 5 minute games are quick and easy to play during a small break. Graphics change according to the time of day the player plays the game.

- Upgrade mechanics and intervals of increasing difficulties. Without upgrades, players will still have a fun and rich experience but later stages will be extremely tough to get by.

- Lots of enemies, lots of power ups. Every level or 'Cloud' brings newer enemies and power-ups.

- Optimised for phones and devices. 16:10 ratio.

On Computer, use Arrow keys
On Mobile/Device, Touch Right/Left/Down of screen to move
